name: noclick
description: NoClick - The smarter alternative to ClickUp. AI-powered project management that works the way you think.
author: CloudExtel Development Team

scripts.db:setup: PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -U postgres -d noclick_db -f db/complete-schema.sql
scripts.db:reset: psql -d $DATABASE_URL -c 'DROP SCHEMA public CASCADE; CREATE SCHEMA public;' && npm run db:setup
scripts.db:demo: PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -U postgres -d noclick_db -f db/demo-data.sql
